name: @kintone/mcp-server
description: The official MCP Server for Kintone
long_description: This extension provides Model Context Protocol (MCP) server capabilities for Kintone, allowing AI assistants to interact with your Kintone applications.

kintone_base_url.title: Kintone Base URL
kintone_base_url.description: The base URL of your Kintone environment (e.g., https://example.cybozu.com)

kintone_api_token.title: Kintone API Token
kintone_api_token.description: API token for authentication (comma-separated for multiple tokens, max 9 tokens). If both API token and username & password are provided, username & password will take priority.

kintone_pfx_file_path.title: PFX File Path
kintone_pfx_file_path.description: Path to PFX client certificate file for authentication

kintone_pfx_file_password.title: PFX File Password
kintone_pfx_file_password.description: Password for PFX client certificate file

kintone_attachments_dir.title: Attachments Directory
kintone_attachments_dir.description: Directory path where downloaded files from Kintone will be saved. Required for file download operations.
